name: Shootie Foodie (Web XR)
description:
Foodie Shootie is simply funny that hopes to put a smile on your face. 

To move the gun using a mouse click,  press "T" button for triggering the gun,  each food item worth 10 points. Shoot away and collect all  60 points from 6 items.

This is my first demo WebXR game I am proud to present. Have fun and enjoy shooting flying food!!
